ComicInfo.Title: George W. Bush Faces the Drug Issue Head-on!; Mad’s Etiquette Guide for Drunk Drivers; Which Webcam Is It…?; The Lighter Side of...; Spot Your Parents!; Melvin & Jenkins' Guide to Technology; Only a Republican/Democrat Could Possibly Believe… (Part 2); Harry Plodder and the Kidney Stone; A Mad Look at Toy Story 2; Magic 8 Ball Answers for the New Millennium; Monroe and… Health Class; Is it Really Cause for Celebration When…; 7th Heaving
ComicInfo.Summary: A cynical look at justice, borrowing, trophies, criticism, payback, balance, relationships, flirting, therapy, business, the office, proof, and doctors.
